channel.title: My bmi calculator need help
channel.description: Ok i have i question i have this [sup]result=a/b*b;[/sup] now it is like this ex: a=64 b=1.81 and c++ compiler calculate it liek this 64/1.81*1.81 but i need that it would calculate this: 64/3.276 how to make it i tried [sup]64/(1.81*1.81)[/sup] didnt work help!!![br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2007, 05:22:17 AM[/size][hr]first i need that it would mat 1.81*1.81

item.title: My bmi calculator need help
item.dc:creator: @aaalba aaalba
item.description:
@aaalba wrote:

Thanks now my conde is working !!!

[code]#include
#include
using namespace std;
int main ()
{

float a, b, c;
float result;
cout << "BMI calculator \n";
cout << " Enter your weight(kg):";
cin >> a;
cout << "\n Enter your height(meters):";
cin >> b;
cout << "\n Your BMI is ";

  result=a/(b*b);
cout <<  result;
cout << "\n";
cout << "\n Underweight = <18.5 , Normal weight = 18.5-24.9 ,";
cout << "Obesity = 30 and higher.\n";
cout << "\n Thanks for using my first c++ script :] ";
return 0;

}
[/code]

item.title: My bmi calculator need help

@zstars wrote:

An int can hold only integer values. Use float or double for floating point numbers.

item.title: My bmi calculator need help
item.dc:creator: @aaalba aaalba
item.description:
@aaalba wrote:

I wanted to make bmi calculator but its not working your formula dont work …mabey i dont know help where is the bad place ???

[code]#include
#include
using namespace std;
int main ()
{

int a, b, i;
int result;
cout << "BMI calculator \n";
cout << " Enter your weight(kg):";
cin >> a;
cout << "\n Enter your height(meters ex. 1.7):";
cin >> b;
cout << "Your BMI is ";
  i = b*b;
  result = a/i;
cout <<  result;
cout << "\n";
cout << "\n Underweight = <18.5 , Normal weight = 18.5-24.9 ,";
cout << "Obesity = 30 and higher.";
cout << "\n Thanks for using my first c++ script :] ";
return 0;

}
[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2007, 05:45:28 AM[/size][hr]it work but calculates bad like my first post said
